metadata.title: CVE-2018-14326 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In MP4v2 2.0.0, there is an integer overflow (with resultant memorycorruption) when resizing MP4Array for the ftyp atom in mp4array.h.

criterions.comment: mp4v2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
